schema.description: All tokens minted by the contract (paginated)
schema.title: All tokens

ui:options.title: All Tokens
ui:options.description: Retrieves a list of all tokens minted by the contract, with the option to paginate results.

ui:options.title: Limit
ui:options.description: (Optional) Set the maximum number of tokens to retrieve at once.

ui:options.title: Start After
ui:options.description: (Optional) Specify the token ID to start the list after, for pagination purposes.
